scripts.setup: npm install . && npm install frontend --prefix frontend && npx husky init && npm run admin-install-reqs && npm run admin-install-dev-reqs && npm run flags-install-reqs && npm run flags-install-dev-reqs
scripts.docker-deps-clean: docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose-deps.yml down -v --remove-orphans && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose-deps.yml pull && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose-deps.yml up --build
scripts.docker-flagship-dev-clean: docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose-dev.yml down -v --remove-orphans && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose-dev.yml pull && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose-dev.yml up --build
scripts.docker-flagship-clean: docker-compose down -f docker/docker-compose.yml -v --remove-orphans && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml pull && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up --build
scripts.all-tests: npm run admin-unit-tests && npm run admin-api-tests && npm run flags-unit-tests && npm run flags-api-tests
